source_chain.description: The blockchain network where the swap originates.

destination_chain.description: The blockchain network where the swap completes.

source_asset.description: The asset being swapped on the source blockchain.

destination_asset.description: The asset to be received on the destination blockchain.

initiator_source_address.description: The wallet address initiating the swap on the source blockchain.

initiator_destination_address.description: The wallet address to receive the asset on the destination blockchain.

source_amount.description: The amount of the asset being swapped on the source blockchain.

destination_amount.description: The amount of the asset expected on the destination blockchain.

fee.description: The total cost associated with the swap transaction.

nonce.description: A unique identifier for the swap transaction to prevent duplication.

min_destination_confirmations.description: The minimum number of confirmations required on the destination blockchain to finalize the swap.

timelock.description: A timeout period after which the swap expires if not completed.

secret_hash.description: A cryptographic hash used to verify the transaction's security.

deadline.description: Validity till the current quote is valid

bitcoin_optional_recipient.description: An optional Bitcoin address to receive the output token, if specified.
